terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.content:
### 1. Purpose
These terms govern the use of the BriefMate platform by its users.

### 2. Access to the service
The service is available for free with limited features. A subscription unlocks all features.

### 3. User account
The user is responsible for the information provided and the confidentiality of their account.

### 4. Personal data
Data is processed in accordance with our privacy policy. No data is shared with third parties without consent.

### 5. Termination
Users may cancel their subscription at any time from their account page.

### 6. Modifications
BriefMate reserves the right to update these terms at any time.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
**Last updated: July 30, 2025**

## 1. Data Collected
We collect the information you provide when registering (first name, last name, email), and data related to your use of the service (briefs, preferences, payments).

## 2. Use of Data
Your data is used only to:
- Provide the BriefMate service
- Improve the user experience
- Manage payments and access

## 3. Storage and Security
Your data is stored securely and never sold. We use industry-standard security tools.

## 4. Your Rights
In accordance with GDPR, you can request access to, modification, or deletion of your data at any time by contacting us at **support@brief-mate.com**.

## 5. Cookies
BriefMate uses cookies to:
- Improve navigation
- Measure site traffic
You can disable cookies via your browser settings.

## 6. Contact
For any questions about this policy, please reach out to:
**support@brief-mate.com**
